Package com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.regex.addons.saxlike

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Handler
    By implementing a handler like this, you get informed about matched tokens and the text between matched tokens (so-called noMatches), i.e about the entire content of the stream.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HandlerAwareModifier
    This Modifier allows you to use a kind of SAX handler to process tokens and the texts between the tokens: Handler.
    HandlerAwareNoMatch
    Helper class for HandlerAwareModifier.
    HandlerAwareTokenProcessor
    Helper class for HandlerAwareModifier.
